name: Sog mein asl siyah libas hai, woh toh Rafiziyon ne liya aur unhein zeiba bhi tha.
Shi'a is ummat ki auraten hain.
Buzurgon ke damaan ko chhodne wale har daur mein gumrah hue hain.
Muqallid o Ghair Muqallid mein Farq
content: Jo mareez tabeeb se ilaaj karwaye aur sehhat yaab ho jaye usay Muqallid kehte hain.Jo atibba (doctors) se ladey, pansaari ki dukaan se apni marzi ki dawa utha kar khata rahe aur apne marz ko aisa bigaare ke phir tabeeb bhi usko la ilaaj qarar de de, usay Ghair Muqallid kehte hain.

name: Sahaba par ta'an karne wala kaafir hai.
content: Farmaan e Imam Zahabi *rahmatullah alaih* “Kitaab al-Kabaair”

name: Ek Aalim-e-Deen ghair Aalim Sayyid se afzal hai! Agarche Sayyid kitna hi saalih(parhezgaar) kyun na ho.

College ho ya Madrasa agarche kesa hi deeni kehlata ho, aytebaar taleem ka hai, agar usme Deen-e Islam ya Mazhab-e Ahlesunnat ya shariat-e mutahharah ke khilaf taleem di jaati talqeen ki jaati hai to uski imdad bhi haram aur usme padhna padhwana bhi haram
